overview: From 2025-04-13 to 2025-04-20, elizaos/eliza had 39 new PRs (34 merged), 10 new issues, and 28 active contributors.

completedItems.title: Fix relationship between entities and agents
completedItems.body:
In v2, the concept of `entities` represent an instance of an agent, while an agent itself refers to its `character`.

There is a mix up of these concepts happening within `AgentRuntime.initialize()` that currently requires to create a `ch

completedItems.title: fix: Use utils-based UUID for broader browser support
completedItems.body:
related: https://github.com/elizaOS/eliza/issues/4315

Fallback to a custom UUID generator for browsers that don't support crypto.randomUUID().

completedItems.title: fix: persistent beacon by handling tour close action
completedItems.body:
related: https://github.com/elizaOS/eliza/issues/4316

Mark onboarding as complete when the tour is closed manually to prevent lingering blue beacon.
